caption.title: Fe solubility versus Fe concentration (ng m −3) for field data (black squares), IMPACT (red squares), TM4-ECPL (orange squares), CAM4 (purple squares), and GEOS-Chem (blue squares) over the Southern Ocean (>45°S).
caption.p: The vertical lines in symbols correspond to ±1 SD for Fe solubility in aerosols.
